title: chocolatier logo: two fonts
content:
Hi,

could someone please id these two fonts for me?

Many thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203224728im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bannergold_6070.jpg)

 [‹ Script used on cover of GQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203224728/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41233 "Go to previous forum topic") [Apple ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203224728/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41224 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ludwell

comments.content:
holly looks hand drawn

Creative Chocolatier looks like Copperplate Gothic
CHOCO - hard to tell with so few letters, could be anything from a Caslon to a Times

holly is definitively hand drawn.  
choco could be caslon  
creative could also be engravers gothic or sackers
